Query: remove empty lines from text file with PowerShell

Top-3 Similar Questions: so_28279928: How to remove a line from a file in bash?
so_68347904: How to remove empty lines from a string in bash using parameter expansion?
Top-3 Scripts:
so_28279928: while read -r line
do
  if ! [[ $line =~ "dirs" ]]
  then
    echo $line
  fi
done < tmp
